thread.section_title: Not Socks Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Not Socks | notsocks.co.nz
thread.title: Nicola

author: Nicola
title: Nicola
text: Not socks has a large variety of gifts available at the click of a button. But their service is so much more than that. Each gift is packaged beautifully and delivered quickly. I found this site particularly useful given that I live overseas with all my family still in NZ, it makes birthdays & special occasions a breeze! They go the extra mile - add notes, wrap all items together, any requests are easily met. As soon as I place an order I receive email confirmation and then another as soon as its posted. Their response time is excellent. I am notified if there are any problems and kept in the loop about the progress of my deliveries. Can't say enough good things about them. Just try them and see for yourself.
